name: Paralisia
description:
Paralisia is a game made with so much love. Its our second jam and like the first jam, we have learn a lot, for the future projects. So, about Paralisia. Is a almost top-down game, with a little action and some claustrophobic and agonizing aspects. 

  1. For attack press Z
  2. For use Herb press X
  3. For interact press C

So, thanks a lot for the organization of HeartGameJam, for propose such nice and fun time. See ya!
